job.title: Software Engineer - Platform Backend - Java
job.description:
Squarespace is looking for passionate backend engineers to build and scale the backend systems that power millions of Squarespace websites. We firmly believe that design is not merely "how it looks" but "how it works." A great product is reliable, performant, and scales with the growth of the customer base and the team. The product platform teams focus on platform level optimizations, working with product engineering teams to assess what the highest impact areas for our customers are. If you are a server-side engineer who enjoys or is interested in working on platform scalability, reliability, and performance, we want to hear from you! You will report to the V6 Foundations Engineering Manager in our New York City headquarters.
All Squarespace employees are working remotely at this time. We are closely monitoring the status of COVID-19 as we continue our work to build a return-to-work plan that ensures a safe return to our offices and provides flexibility for our employees.
As a Platform Software Engineer, You Will
Analyze and profile frameworks and endpoints to identify and fix latency and bottlenecks
Refactor existing components and code paths into clearer, standardized, documented, and testable modules
Improve the developer experience for other engineers that use the platform
Write testable, readable, and maintainable code, with automated tests
Collaborate with other engineers and teams to ensure the seamless rollout of platform optimizations
Participate in platform level architecture discussions and decisions
About You
You will succeed as a Platform Engineer if you:
Are interested in working on platform scalability, reliability, and performance
Have been programming production systems in Java for at least a year
Understand different data structures and how they can be leveraged to optimize algorithms
Have experience working with Java frameworks like Spring, Guice, Jersey, or Dropwizard
Ask a lot of questions to understand why things are the way they are
Are passionate about code quality
Have experience or interest in optimizing inefficient APIs, code paths, or database queries
If you’re interested in this role, we encourage you to apply even if you don’t meet all of the above qualifications.
Your Team And Manager Will
What you can expect from us:
Create an inclusive environment that’s psychologically safe and encourages learning
Mentor and guide you through navigating and understanding the codebase
Work with you to build a personalized career growth plan with clear expectations and milestones
Benefits & Perks
Health insurance with 100% premium covered for you and your dependent children
Flexible vacation & paid time off
Up to 20 weeks of paid family leave
Equity plan for all employees
Retirement benefits with employer match
Fertility and adoption benefits
Free lunch and snacks at all offices
Education reimbursement
Dog-friendly workplace in New York office
Commuter benefit in the form of reduced tax (Ireland) and pretax (US)
About Squarespace
Squarespace makes beautiful products to help people with creative ideas succeed. By blending elegant design and sophisticated engineering, we empower millions of people — from individuals and local artists to entrepreneurs shaping the world's most iconic businesses — to share their stories with the world. Squarespace's team of more than 1,200 is headquartered in downtown New York City, with offices in Dublin, Los Angeles and Portland. For more information, visit www.squarespace.com/about.
Today, more than a million people around the globe use Squarespace to share different perspectives and experiences with the world. Not only do we embrace and celebrate the diversity of our customer base, but we also strive for the same in our employees. At Squarespace, we are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ethnicity, ancestry, religion, national origin, gender, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital or parental status, disability, veteran status, or other class
